name: aMaze Achievements: darkness
description: What is this game?aMaze Achievements: darkness is a single-player top down 3D adventure game. This is the first game in "aMaze Achivements" series.What do you need to do in this game?You will be playing for a small light ball. Main mission of each level is to fly through the maze and find all hidden rubins.What do you need to complete this game?Your patience, concentration and some sleight of hand, of course ;)
